examples: The book was hidden below the shelf.
La temperatura está debajo del punto de congelación.
El libro estaba escondido debajo del estante.

suggested: The treasure was hidden under the sea.
The dog ran under the bed.
Beneath the surface of the water lies a whole new world.
The temperature is lower in the valley.
The prices are lower below the equator.
He let out a loud bellow from below.
The trail descends below the tree line.
The tunnels ran underneath the city.
Beneath the layers of dirt lies a rich history.
